text: 35|28|maṉitarkaḷilum, uyiruḷḷavaṟṟilum (āṭu, māṭu, oṭṭakam mutaliya) kālnaṭaikaḷilum ivvāṟē pala niṟaṅkaḷ irukkiṉṟaṉa. Niccayamāka allāhvuṭaiya aṭiyārkaḷil avaṉukkup payappaṭupavarkaḷellām (aṟivuṭaiya) kalvimāṉkaḷtāṉ. Niccayamāka allāh (aṉaivaraiyum) mikaittavaṉum mikka maṉṉippuṭaiyavaṉum āvāṉ
